data.title: 'Danger Force' Ending After 3 Seasons on Nickelodeon, Cast & Crew Say Goodbye
data.meta_description: It's a sad week for Danger Force fans... The Nickelodeon spinoff of Henry Danger has aired it's final episode as ...
data.meta_site_name: â€˜Danger Forceâ€™ Ending After 3 Seasons on Nickelodeon, Cast & Crew Say Goodbye | Danger Force, Nickelodeon, Television : Just Jared Jr.
data.text:
Itâ€™s a sad week for Danger Force fansâ€¦

The Nickelodeon spinoff of Henry Danger has aired itâ€™s final episode as the show comes to an end after three seasons on the network.

Cooper Barnes and Michael D Cohen reprised their roles, and were joined in the series by new young stars Havan Flores, Terrence Little Gardenhigh, Dana Heath and Luca Luhan. Henry Danger himself, Jace Norman, made several guest appearances.

Series director and producer Mike Caron, as well as members of the cast confirmed the show was ending with emotional posts on social media.

Keep reading to learn moreâ€¦

Danger Force was first announced in February 2020, and the third season first premiered in April 2023, before the final episode aired earlier this week.

If you recall, this is not the end of Henry Danger, though, as there is a movie in the works with Jace Norman. He also recently shared a photo outside of Paramount Studios, writing, â€œOh we cookin â€¦ donâ€™t worry ğŸŒŠğŸ¬ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸â€

In Mikeâ€˜s post, he actually revealed that they filmed the series finale over a year ago, in December 2022!

Check out all of the posts about the show ending belowâ€¦

Cooper Barnes wrote, â€œGoodbye, Studio 11. Thanks for all the great memories. To Dana, Terrence, Luca and Havan- thanks for spending a big chunk of your childhood with me, and for being so talented and funny. It wasnâ€™t always easy, and life certainly threw its challenges at us, but we persevered and made a lot of people happy during our nationâ€™s darkest time. Iâ€™m very proud of that, and Iâ€™m very proud of you. To everyone involved, from the imaginative writers, the wonderful guest stars, the tenacious producers, the best crew in town, the folks at the network who saw the potential of this worldâ€¦ I am incredibly grateful for all of you. And to the fans, who have poured so much love and dedication into this universe all this time- none of this couldâ€™ve happened without you. It has been such a privilege to play #CaptainMan for 9 amazing years. What a ride. I love Ray so much, and I hope youâ€™re as happy for him (and where we leave him in this finale) as I am. All good things must eventually end. But this world, these characters, live on in your hearts, and in mine. And Iâ€™d be very surprised if we didnâ€™t meet again one day. So letâ€™s not call it the end. Letâ€™s just call it goodbye, for now. ğŸ’™â¤ï¸#DangerForceâ€

Michael D Cohen shared, â€œDid you watch the last episode of @henrydangerforce last night? What did you think of our epic finale? Many thanks to the whole crew for an amazing run. Special thanks to my fellow cast members @therealcooperbarnes @littlegardenhigh @missdanaheath #havaflores #lucaluhan and of course @ceejaynowak for inventing the premise, @mikecaron_la @jakefarrow @robynnotrobin and so many more writers and crewâ€¦ too many to name. See you on the streaming side â¤ï¸â€

Dana Heath captioned her post, â€œWellâ€¦ this is it. If you would have told me that 5 years ago I would be a superhero on Nickelodeon, I wouldnâ€™t have been able to believe it. Sometimes I still donâ€™t. I canâ€™t even put into words how freaking grateful I am for this experience. For all the friends and family Iâ€™ve made because of it. Thank you @ceejaynowak for believing in me from the beginning to the end. Thank you @mikecaron_la for always making me laugh and cry lol. Couldnâ€™t have made it through without you. Thank you @therealcooperbarnes and @michaeldcohen for shaping my personality and sense of humor, As well as being so welcoming and taking me under your wings when I was 13. Thank you my dearest twin @littlegardenhigh I couldnâ€™t have asked for a better brother. To the amazing Crew, Production, Casting and Writers, thank you for making this show as amazing as you did. And for giving me the honor to work with you on this project. And thank you to everyone who supported and watched me grow throughout the years. Without you guys watching the episodes every time it aired, making edits and art, and loving the characters as much as you doâ€¦ there wouldnâ€™t be a show. Mika will always hold a special place in my heart. All Iâ€™ve ever wanted was to make kids happy. And we did. Thank you. So so much.â€

Terrence Little Gardenhigh wrote, â€œAfter last nightâ€™s episode, I just had to post my last day. I am so grateful and appreciative of the family I had on this set! It was life changing and life learning. You all helped me grow up, and I had to do it fast sometimes, but i donâ€™t regret a thing!!.
